item.title: Outside 289 West End Lane, 20th August
item.description:
The drain gulley is blocked. Following the road resurfacing this drain gulley and multiple others along the road where it has been resurfaced are blocked or at least have excessive about of tarmac in them. This area floods regularly due to blocked road gulley drains during heavy rain fall.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 295-297, West End Lane, West Hampstead, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Hedgecutting needed, 20th August
item.description:
Hi, I am the facilities co-coordinator for The Complete Works - South London School based at 66 Lancaster Street, SE1 0RZ. There are two hedges either side of our entrance that I am unsure whether they sit within our boundary frame or are the responsibility of the council to maintain. It would be great to have some clarification on this, and if they are under the councils boundaries - have someone come out to trim them. Thank you!
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): King James Street, Elephant and Castle, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Furniture, 20th August
item.description:
